xml.name: Precise Navigation
xml.Text: Several shortcuts for the navigation inside the code file can make your development much more efficient - let's take a quick look on them
xml.Try: There are several warnings and an error in the file. Navigate to the first error in the file using GotoNextError
Now jump to the next error using the same shortcut
Jump back to the first error using GotoPreviousError
Now comment each of these lines using CommentByLineComment - GotoNextError - CommentByLineComment
Cool! Now try pressing GotoNextError again - it should point you to the first warning in the file.
Use ShowIntentionActions to fix the first warning
To quickly jump to the next method in the current file, press MethodDown
Jump to the previous method using MethodUp
Imagine you have a long file, and it's hard to remember, where have you changed something. Press JumpToLastChange to jump to the last change you've made in the file.
Finally, when you need to jump to a specific line/column in your code - just press GotoLine
